text: Piers Richard Corbyn (born 10 March 1947)Wired: "Everyone Complains About the Weather... Piers Corbyn Is Doing Something About It." Tom Standage, February 1999. URL accessed 14 March 2007. is a British businessman and conspiracy theorist. He was born in Chippenham. He is the owner of the business WeatherAction which makes weather forecasts. It claims to make accurate forecasts up to a year in advance. He is the older brother of former Labour Party leader Jeremy Corbyn. ==References== Category:Jeremy Corbyn Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:British businesspeople Category:Chippenham Category:People from Wiltshire
title: Piers Corbyn
